timeline.title: Senior Software Engineer
timeline.description: Architecting high-performance Android and Flutter applications, optimizing thermal printing latency by 40% and managing 10k+ monthly transactions with 99.9% uptime.

timeline.title: Software Engineer (Android)
timeline.description: Enhanced location-based features using Google Maps API, improving delivery accuracy by 90% and boosting user engagement by 15% through A/B testing.

timeline.title: Senior Android Developer
timeline.description: Led the development of global gaming platforms, integrating Unity and real-time chat via Pusher while maintaining 92% crash-free sessions.

timeline.title: Software Engineer (Android)
timeline.description: Engineered a GPS-based attendance system with image validation, improving tracking accuracy by 40% and automating HR workflows.
